page.title: 09FARMING
page.content: Most of the farms in the area are arable farms,because the fields are fertile . There are a couple of mixed farms. Most farms in our area are quite small. The average number of people farms employ is three.Not all are full_ time.This is because they use modern machinery,such as: tractors,milling machines and egg graders. Also they use sprayers, ploughs, cultivators, combine_harvesters, fork_lifts and drills. Some farms have livestock and some just have poultry .The crops grown are Barley, Wheat, Beans, Peas, Oil_seed rape and potatoes.Most of the farms in our area grow the same crops every year but the larger farms rotate their crops each year.The corn,wheat and barley is sold to merchants and one farmer sells locally.
